SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_ID , A.AUTH_GRP_NM , COALESCE(A.AUTH_GRP_DESC, ' ') AS AUTH_GRP_DESC , A.CREATE_DT , A.USE_CD , A.ORD , A.USR_TYP , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'ADM00004', A.USR_TYP, '1') AS USR_TYP_NM , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ACCEPT_USE_CD, '1') AS ACCEPT_USE_NM FROM ADM1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.USE_CD = '01'
ORDER BY ORD ASC

SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT Y.* FROM ( SELECT Z.* , COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY UP_MENU_NM) AS GRP_CNT , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY UP_MENU_NM ORDER BY ORD ASC) AS GRP_RANK FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM ADM1000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS UP_MENU_NM , (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM ADM1000 Z WHERE Z.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID) AS UPUP_MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM ADM1000 T2 WHERE T2.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND T2.MENU_ID = (SELECT UPPER_MENU_ID FROM ADM1000 T1 WHERE T1.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND T1.MENU_ID = A.UPPER_MENU_ID)) AS UPUP_MENU_NM , B.PRJ_ID , B.AUTH_GRP_ID , COALESCE(B.MAIN_YN, 'N') AS MAIN_YN , COALESCE(B.ACCESS_YN, 'N') AS ACCESS_YN , COALESCE(B.SELECT_YN, 'N') AS SELECT_YN , COALESCE(B.REG_YN, 'N') AS REG_YN , COALESCE(B.MODIFY_YN, 'N') AS MODIFY_YN , COALESCE(B.DEL_YN, 'N') AS DEL_YN , COALESCE(B.EXCEL_YN, 'N') AS EXCEL_YN , COALESCE(B.PRINT_YN, 'N') AS PRINT_YN , 'R' AS STATUS /* R:조회, C:등록, U:수정, D:삭제 */ , A.MENU_TYPE_CD , A.ORD , A.LVL , A.MODULE_TYPE FROM ADM1000 A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ADM1200 WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_ID = #authGrpId# AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND (A.MENU_ID < '000900000000' OR A.MENU_ID >= '001000000000')
AND A.USE_CD = '01' ) Z ) Y START WITH Y.UPPER_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR Y.MENU_ID = Y.UPPER_MENU_ID OR Y.UPPER_MENU_ID = Y.UPUP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY Y.ORD ASC ) X WHERE 1=1 AND X.LVL = 3
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS DUP_YN FROM ADM1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = #newAuthGrpId#
